SEARCH:
Package at.technikum.springrestbackend.config.mapper

Klasse InternalModelMapper

java.lang.Object
at.technikum.springrestbackend.config.mapper.InternalModelMapper
@Component public class InternalModelMapper extends Object
A utility class for mapping between Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) and entity classes using the ModelMapper library.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    InternalModelMapper(org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper)
    Constructs an InternalModelMapper with a ModelMapper instance.

    Maps an entity object to its corresponding Data Transfer Object (DTO).
    <T, U> T

    Maps a Data Transfer Object (DTO) to its corresponding entity object.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • InternalModelMapper

      public InternalModelMapper(org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper)
      Constructs an InternalModelMapper with a ModelMapper instance.
      Parameter:
      modelMapper - The ModelMapper instance to use it for mapping.

  • Methodendetails

    • mapToDTO

      public <T, U> U mapToDTO(T entity, Class<U> dtoClass)
      Maps an entity object to its corresponding Data Transfer Object (DTO).
      Typparameter:
      T - The type of the entity.
      U - The type of the DTO.
      Parameter:
      entity - The entity object to be mapped.
      dtoClass - The class of the target DTO.
      Gibt zurück:
      The mapped DTO object.

    • mapToEntity

      public <T, U> T mapToEntity(U dto, Class<T> entityClass)
      Maps a Data Transfer Object (DTO) to its corresponding entity object.
      Typparameter:
      T - The type of the entity.
      U - The type of the DTO.
      Parameter:
      dto - The DTO object to be mapped.
      entityClass - The class of the target entity.
      Gibt zurück:
      The mapped entity object.
